Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can include different plants and animals, showing where they live.
The student can draw and label the needs of the fish in its habitat, like water and oxygen.
The student can illustrate and label the relationship between the fish and its environment.
The student can represent how the fish's habitat provides the resources it needs to survive, such as water and food.
The student can show how the fish is part of a system with its habitat and other organisms.
